text: Avoid the ASUS VivoBook Pro 15, 15.6" Full HD IPS Level Display, Intel Core i7-8750H, NVIDIA GTX 1050 4 GB, 8 GB DDR4 + 16 GB Intel Optane Memory, 1 TB HDD Optane Enhanced, Fingerprint, N580GD-DB74 if you can. The NVIDIA GTX 1050 is okay, but the cons outweigh the pros. The chassis feels surprisingly flimsy for the price.. Looking to return it.

Avoid the ASUS VivoBook Pro 15, 15.6" Full HD IPS Level Display, Intel Core i7-8750H, NVIDIA GTX 1050 4 GB, 8 GB DDR4 + 16 GB Intel Optane Memory, 1 TB HDD Optane Enhanced, Fingerprint, N580GD-DB74 if you can. The NVIDIA GTX 1050 is okay, but the cons outweigh the pros. The screen developed dead pixels within a month.. Looking to return it.

Had several issues with the ASUS VivoBook Pro 15, 15.6" Full HD IPS Level Display, Intel Core i7-8750H, NVIDIA GTX 1050 4 GB, 8 GB DDR4 + 16 GB Intel Optane Memory, 1 TB HDD Optane Enhanced, Fingerprint, N580GD-DB74 since day one. Wi-Fi drops intermittently and the keyboard feels cheap. Performance in content creation and gaming is not as advertised. Regret this purchase.

Quite disappointed with this laptop, the ASUS VivoBook Pro 15, 15.6" Full HD IPS Level Display, Intel Core i7-8750H, NVIDIA GTX 1050 4 GB, 8 GB DDR4 + 16 GB Intel Optane Memory, 1 TB HDD Optane Enhanced, Fingerprint, N580GD-DB74. It performance throttles under load frequently when playing Starfield, and the performance throttles significantly. The keyboard has been a letdown. Wouldn't recommend.

Quite disappointed with this laptop, the ASUS VivoBook Pro 15, 15.6" Full HD IPS Level Display, Intel Core i7-8750H, NVIDIA GTX 1050 4 GB, 8 GB DDR4 + 16 GB Intel Optane Memory, 1 TB HDD Optane Enhanced, Fingerprint, N580GD-DB74. It performance throttles under load frequently when playing Elden Ring, and the performance throttles significantly. The screen brightness has been a letdown. Wouldn't recommend.
